segments.text: I notice the window above the sink, offering a glimpse outside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden visible through the panes looks so peaceful and orderly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A neat path and well-maintained bushes create a calm scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Itâ€™s such a stark contrast to the chaos unfolding inside this kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The outside world seems completely untroubled, almost serene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Inside, water is gushing, a stool is tipping, and cookies are being stolen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a pang of sadness for the beautiful kitchen that's being flooded.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The serene garden makes the domestic disaster feel even more poignant.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If only the woman would turn around and see what's happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sun shines brightly, illuminating both the calm and the storm.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It highlights the quiet tragedy of unnoticed destruction.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Such a peaceful exterior masks such an active interior disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR
